file_content.text: Hey, what are you doing? Get away from that! Back off!
This is our hydrosupply, and we like it broken. Now get lost.
What are you kids doing here?
Who are you?
We live here. Who do you think you are, stomping in here like this?
The hydrosupply belongs to the Republic. I'm here to fix it.
This isn't yours.
No! We need it to stay broken.
Get out of the way.
Hey, I told you to get lost!
We need this water. We don't have any money, and there's nowhere else in the district to get water for free. We'll die if it gets shut off.
What happened to your parents?
No one looks after you?
They died in the war, all right? We're on our own now.
How awful.
Yeah, well, sorry doesn't help us much.
I gave my word as a Jedi to repair this device.
I have to fix the hydrosupply.
You're a Jedi? Aren't you supposed to help people?
Many more will die if the hydrosupply is not repaired.
You don't understand.
So? Nobody cares about us, why should we care?
You can always get by if you've got five fingers, kid.
Just steal what you need.
I've stolen stuff before, but I hate it. Everybody I take things from is poor like us.
Orders are orders. I just follow them.
I'm just doing my job.
You're not listening!
Just leave us alone. This is the only place we've got and the only way for us to get by.
If I gave you some credits, would you be able to find a new place to go?
What if I helped you get by?
Yeah, that'd be a start. It'll take a lot, though. Are you gonna give us enough?
I wish I could help you, but this broken hydrosupply is a serious problem.
I'm sorry, I have to fix this.
Why are you still in my way?
Don't you care about anything?
Fine. But couldn't you... at least give us some credits, or something? Help us out at least that much?
This should take care of you and your friends.
Here--take these supplies.
Whoa! I've never even seen that many credits before.
We can trade for a long time with these. Thanks!
You're not getting anything from me.
No way.
Fine. Seal up our hydrosupply, then. You don't care what happens to us. Nobody does.
